bisq.core.dao.node.lite.network

Class LiteNodeNetworkService

  • java.lang.Object
    • bisq.core.dao.node.lite.network.LiteNodeNetworkService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    bisq.network.p2p.network.ConnectionListener, bisq.network.p2p.network.MessageListener, bisq.network.p2p.peers.PeerManager.Listener

    public class LiteNodeNetworkService
extends java.lang.Object
implements bisq.network.p2p.network.MessageListener, bisq.network.p2p.network.ConnectionListener, bisq.network.p2p.peers.PeerManager.Listener
    Responsible for requesting BSQ blocks from a full node and for listening to new blocks broadcasted by full nodes.
